LanguageData.TerrainZoneSelect.TerrainStockpileZoneEx: Create a stockpile, using selected terrain, where your colonists will store resources.\nThis tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
Create a stockpile, using selected terrain, where your colonists will store junk.\nThis tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
LanguageData.TerrainZoneSelect.TerrainGrowZoneDesc: Create a zone, using selected terrain, where your colonists will try to grow a certain kind of plant.
LanguageData.TerrainZoneSelect.TerrainShrinkZoneDesc: Remove zones using selected terrain, like stockpile zones or growing zones.
